abstract: American airstrike in Yemen kills dozens of fighters affiliated with Al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula, in sign of Pentagon's intensified fight against militants in Middle East and Africa.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Strike in Yemen Kills Dozens in Qaeda Affiliate, Officials Say
headline.main: U.S. Strike in Yemen Kills Dozens in Qaeda Affiliate, Officials Say

keywords.value: Al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula
keywords.name: organizations

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

snippet: The airstrike was the latest sign that the Pentagon is hastening its strikes against militants in the Middle East and Africa.
lead_paragraph: The airstrike was the latest sign that the Pentagon is hastening its strikes against militants in the Middle East and Africa.
